  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120224</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120224</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Določite relativne  hitrosti</string>
            <string language="en">Determine relative velocities</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stellen Sie relative Geschwindigkeiten fest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Déterminez les vitesses relatives</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Determine velocidades relativas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Determini le velocità relative</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθορίστε τις σχετικές ταχύτητες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Determine las velocidades relativas</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Dve različni meritvi istega gibanja in določitev transformacije med opazovalnima sistemoma.</string>
            <string language="en">Two different measurements of the same motion and determining the transformation between reference frames.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">galilejeva transformacija</string>
            <string language="en">galilean transformation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">opazovalni sistem</string>
            <string language="en">reference frame</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwei unterschiedliche Messen der gleichen 
Bewegung und der Bestimmung der Transformation zwischen Bezugsfeldern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Deux mesures différentes du même mouvement et 
de déterminer la transformation entre les trames de référence.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Duas medidas diferentes do mesmo movimento e de 
determinar a transformação entre frames da referência.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Due misure differenti dello stesso movimento e di
determinazione della trasformazione fra le strutture di riferimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύο διαφορετικές μετρήσεις της ίδιας κίνησης και του 
καθορισμού του μετασχηματισμού μεταξύ των πλαισίων αναφοράς.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dos diversas medidas del mismo movimiento y de 
determinar la transformación entre los marcos de la referencia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">galiläische Transformation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bezugsfeld</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">transformation galiléenne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">trame de référence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">transformação galilean</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">frame da referência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">trasformazione galilean</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">struttura di riferimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">galilean μετασχηματισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πλαίσιο αναφοράς</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">transformación galilea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">marco de la referencia</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
